label: Boating and Watercraft
description: Products and services related to boating and watercraft, including kayaks, canoes, rowboats, and accessories.
intents: Learn about different types of boats
Find plans to build my own boat

subcategories.label: Kayaks
subcategories.description: Narrow, one-person boats propelled by a double-bladed paddle.

subcategories.label: Canoes
subcategories.description: Narrow, open boats propelled by a single-bladed paddle.

subcategories.label: Rowboats
subcategories.description: Long, narrow boats propelled by oars.

subcategories.label: Boat Building
subcategories.description: Materials, plans, and tools for building boats.

subcategories.label: Boat Accessories
subcategories.description: Accessories and equipment for boats and watercraft.
